justification: A-centric rationale. It ignores B’s strong preference to keep a workhorse RB and aversion to injuries; offering a doubtful, high-variance WR misfits B’s tastes. While Nelson matches B’s pocket-passer preference, B already has a Tier 1 QB, limiting appeal. The proposal is lopsided and unlikely given B’s needs and philosophy, and the explanation doesn’t engage B’s motivations or constraints.
